title: Google Play System Update for May 2022 brings several Play Store improvements, Self Share for Nearby Share, and more
content:
Google has updated its Google Play System Update support page to highlight all the changes in the May 2022 release. The latest update brings a host of bug fixes and improvements, including new features to help you discover new apps and games on the Play Store and enhancements to the Play Store billing system. In

The post Google Play System Update for May 2022 brings several Play Store improvements, Self Share for Nearby Share, and more appeared first on XDA.
description: The Google Play System Update for May 2022 brings a host of new Play Store features, the new Self Share feature in Nearby Share, and much more!
